column4: is it possible to split a file in to two parts, and then merge them back together afterwards?

well this time on IRC could be spent sleeping...
unfortunately no. I'm just waiting a bit to go to work... (only if at that time I can remember who to go there)

normally at that point i cant be bothered TRYING to remember something
